txt.en: 'I hope my son is doing fine. He's a good dwarf, but he is young.'
'Noglond is a long way to the south. It isn't safe down there, you know.'
'There's a trick to adding norbog-claws to stew. It's all in the way you stir the pot.'
'I am proud of my son, but he needs me to take care of him. He's still very young!'
'When I was GÃ­sli's age, I used to get into so much trouble! I must have worried my father sick!'
'Thorin's Hall is usually free from danger, but you can never be too careful.'
